title: Language Proficiency Deepening Course Through Online Project-Based Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary language proficiency and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Non-real-time collaborative learning in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, aiming to enhance practical language skills

learning_goals: Learners can improve project deliverables by at least 80% based on peer feedback using online discussion boards.
Learners achieve an average rating of 4.0/5.0 or higher in language project completion through at least three asynchronous collaborative activities.
Learners can apply peer assessment rubrics with 90% accuracy in project-based learning processes

resources: Project Templates and Language Assessment Rubrics
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
